identity.title: Comparing the List of Words from Two Files

content.prompt: Construct a program that reads two text files and creates a list of the words that each of these files contains, ignoring the case of the letters. The program should determine which list is larger in size, i.e., which list has more words.\nAssume that all of the words in these text files are separated by a single space characters.
